title: About Us
subtitle: About Us
who_we_are:
Who We Are?

Mr Salons is a hyperlocal platform with ecommerce and a nearby search capabilities, we connect locals and visitors with salons and salons with locals and visitors.
content:
What We Do?

Mr Salons connects customers with salons and salons with customers. Mr Salons offer membership to customers and partnership to salons and other similar vendors within the health and beauty industry.
